WITH v AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(NULLIF('{{ String($json.approval_id || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',''), 'undefined')::uuid AS approval_id,
    NULLIF('{{ String($json.realm || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}','') AS realm_key,
    NULLIF(NULLIF('{{ String($json.context_id || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',''), 'undefined')::uuid AS context_id,
    LOWER('{{ String($json.decision || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}') AS decision,
    NULLIF('{{ String($json.approved_by_principal_id || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '') AS approved_by_principal_id,
    COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ JSON.stringify($json.actor || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'undefined')::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS actor,
    COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ JSON.stringify($json.job_plan || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'undefined')::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS job_plan,
    COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ JSON.stringify($json.reply_target || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'undefined')::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS reply_target,
    NULLIF('{{ String($json.correlation_id || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '') AS correlation_id,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(NULLIF('{{ String($json.occurred_at || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',''), 'undefined')::timestamptz, NOW()) AS approved_at
)
SELECT itsm.aiops_upsert_approval_decision(
  v.realm_key,
  v.approval_id,
  v.context_id,
  v.decision,
  v.approved_by_principal_id,
  v.actor,
  v.job_plan,
  v.reply_target,
  v.correlation_id,
  v.approved_at
) AS id
FROM v;

WITH v AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(NULLIF('{{ String($node["Normalize Input"].json.approval_id || "").replace(/'/g, "''") }}',''), 'undefined')::uuid AS approval_id,
    NULLIF('{{ String($node["Normalize Input"].json.realm || "").replace(/'/g, "''") }}','') AS realm_key,
    LOWER('{{ String($node["Normalize Input"].json.decision || "").replace(/'/g, "''") }}') AS decision,
    COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ JSON.stringify($node["Normalize Input"].json.actor || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'undefined')::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS actor,
    COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ JSON.stringify($node["Normalize Input"].json.job_plan || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'undefined')::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS job_plan,
    COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ JSON.stringify($node["Normalize Input"].json.reply_target || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'undefined')::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS reply_target,
    NULLIF('{{ String($node["Normalize Input"].json.correlation_id || "").replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '') AS correlation_id,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(NULLIF('{{ String($node["Normalize Input"].json.occurred_at || "").replace(/'/g, "''") }}',''), 'undefined')::timestamptz, NOW()) AS occurred_at,
    NULLIF('{{ String($node["Normalize Input"].json.source || "aiops_agent").replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '') AS source,
    NULLIF('{{ String($node["Normalize Input"].json.integrity?.event_key || "").replace(/'/g, "''") }}','') AS event_key
)
SELECT id
FROM (
  SELECT itsm.aiops_insert_approval_decision_audit_event(
    v.realm_key,
    v.approval_id,
    v.decision,
    v.actor,
    v.job_plan,
    v.reply_target,
    v.correlation_id,
    v.occurred_at,
    v.source,
    v.event_key
  ) AS id
  FROM v
) ins
WHERE ins.id IS NOT NULL;
